name: Forgotten Depths (Dannster)
description:
This is my second released game I made for GGJ Cultural Heritage jam.

Deep Sea Operative has been dispatched to site █████████ to retrieve vital information and survey the area.

Playtime - Around 15-20 minutes

Made to be played in one small sitting, no continue button.

Controls -

WASD to move

Space to jump

Shift to Sprint

CTRL to Crouch

E to pick up and drop objects RMB to throw objects

2 or F to equip Lantern

1 or H to Holster
